attributes.action: Reopen the railway line between Matlock and Buxton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This railway link was a main route from Manchester to Derby and London, it was closed in 1968 as a result of the Beeching act. Today it would be a fantastic link through the Peak District, bringing in tourists as well as getting traffic off the busy roads and improving the transport network through the Peak District. 

I created a facebook group in favour of openining this line, the group recived over a 1000 members in a week, showing a positive demand. 

(If you are a facebook user please search "Re - open the railway line between Matlock and Buxton")

Please show your support
